description.EN: Paperwork necessary for commerce facilities management.
description.FR: Travail administratif pour la gestion des bâtiments de commerce.
description.DE: Papiere für das Management von Handelseinrichtungen.
description.IT: Tutti i documenti necessari alla gestione di un esercizio commerciale.

description.EN: Paperwork necessary for managing public facilities such as schools, hospitals and police stations.
description.ES: Paperwork for managing public facilities such as schools, hospitals and police stations.
description.FR: Travail administratif pour la gestion des services publics, tels que les écoles, hôpitaux et postes de police.
description.DE: Papiere für das Management von öffentlichen Einrichtungen wie Schulen, Krankenhäuser und Polizeireviere.
description.IT: I documenti necessari per la gestione di servizi pubblici come scuole, ospedali e stazioni di polizia.

description.EN: The usual paperwork necessary for establishing and organizing a company.
description.ES: The usual paperwork for organizing any company.
description.FR: Quantité de travail administratif habituelle nécessaire à l'organisation de toute société.
description.DE: Die üblichen Papiere zur Organisation eines Unternehmens.
description.IT: I soliti documenti per l'organizzazione aziendale.

description.EN: Paperwork necessary for the management of industries.
description.FR: Travail administratif nécessaire à la gestion industrielle.
description.DE: Papiere für das Management von Industrien.
description.IT: I documenti necessari per la gestione di un'industria.

description.EN: Acquire the skills to reproduce monuments.
description.ES: Acquire the skills to reproduce monuments.
description.DE: Eignen Sie sich die Kenntnis über die Reproduktion von Denkmälern an.
description.IT: Apprendi i procedimenti per la riproduzione di monumenti.

description.EN: Build urban structures on water. Since it will allow you to build residentials, commerce and offices over the water this research will require 3 IFEL Licenses.
description.ES: Build urban structures over the water. Since it will allow you to build residential, commerce and offices over the water this research will take 3 IFEL Licenses.
description.FR: Build urban structures over the water. Since it will allow you to build residential, commerce and offices over the water this research will take 3 IFEL Licenses.
description.DE: Build urban structures over the water. Since it will allow you to build residential, commerce and offices over the water this research will take 3 IFEL Licenses.
description.IT: Costruisci edifici sull'acqua. Dal momento che ti consentirà di costruire edifici commerciali e residenziali sull'acqua, questa ricerca costa 3 licenze IFEL.
